title: Single CAKE token can participate next IFO together with the CAKE/BNB LP token.
body:
Single CAKE token can participate next IFO together with the CAKE/BNB LP token. 

Is it possible to use single CAKE token and CAKE/BNB LP token to participate IFO? Since some users have to exchange CAKE to BNB for LP token to participate IFO and change it back to CAKE after IFO. The slippage hurts.

Some users are more bullish on CAKE . All in CAKE. They don't want to exchange their CAKE token to BNB then exchange it back after IFO. Vice versa. Good for all if we can participate IFO by single CAKE token, and CAKE/BNB pair.

LP token helps in liquidity so it's important. CAKE token holders are beneficial to the CAKE price and the development of the project, as important as LP token. So both of them should be able to participate IFO.
author: 0x82b4226B8E07D60Da7f8BfaBdF88f82928717FCe
